info.institution: Univ. of Western Ontario, London, Ont., Canada
info.occupation: This award fund has been established in memory of the late Jean Tague-Sutcliffe., Dean of the School of Library and Information Science (now the faculty of Information and Media Studies) at the University of Western Ontario from 1984 to 1996, and in recognition of the group of Western PhD students who organized the first Doctoral Students Poster Session at ALISE in 1997. First awarded at the ALISE conference in 2001, the award consists of a certificate, a one-year student annual membership to ALISE, and a $200 cash prize to the first-place winner
